summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Admin Panel features for umiri.me. All admin panel functionality working correctly including access control, stats display, user table, search, grant/revoke premium modals. Mobile navigation has 5 items properly laid out. Admin link visibility correctly controlled based on user role.

issues: 'Made with Emergent' badge overlaps some mobile nav items (Podeli, Profil) - this is an external badge issue, not app navigation issue

passed_tests: GET /api/admin/check returns is_admin:true for admin users
GET /api/admin/check returns is_admin:false for non-admin users
GET /api/admin/stats returns correct stats (total_users, premium, trial, today_moods)
GET /api/admin/stats returns 403 for non-admin users
GET /api/admin/users returns paginated user list with enriched data
GET /api/admin/users?search=X filters users by name/email
POST /api/admin/grant-premium successfully grants premium to user
Admin Panel route /admin accessible
Non-admin user sees 'Nemate pristup admin panelu' message on /admin
Admin user sees full admin panel with stats and user table
Stats cards display: Korisnika, Premium, Trial, Danas aktivnih
Users table displays with columns: Korisnik, Status, Unosa, Poslednja Aktivnost, Akcije
Search input filters users in real-time
'Dodeli Premium' button opens modal with duration options (7d, 30d, 90d, 365d)
'Ukini' button visible for premium users (not trial)
Admin Panel link visible in sidebar ONLY for admin users
Admin Panel link NOT visible in sidebar for non-admin users
Mobile navigation shows 5 items: Poƒçetna, Novo, Kalendar, Podeli, Profil
Mobile nav items visible at 360px, 375px, 414px widths
Desktop navigation shows all nav items including Admin Panel for admin users
seed_data_creation: Created test admin user (admin@umiri.me) and regular user (regular@example.com) with session tokens for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin Panel fully tested. Test users created with sessions. Admin emails configured in backend/.env: admin@umiri.me,share@test.com. Mobile nav has 5 items, desktop nav has 8 items + Admin Panel for admins.
